Price: $34.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:43:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Life Sutra aims to reach our diverse consumers, who may not have the time to access practical ways to implement growth-promoting psychoeducational resources, through our thoughtful and fun relationship-enhancing and educational games and tools.

Life Sutra Card Games

How did we get our start?

We launched Life Sutra to equip individuals, couples & families with practical psychoeducational games to empower their relationships and lives.

What makes our products unique?

Our easy-to-play card or board games distill what matters most in our relationships and lives from my extensive training in psychology. Every game play enriches you and your loved ones with life skills for success and happiness.

Why do we love what we do?

I love accelerating growth creatively. It naturally brings me great joy to do this through our games for our Life Sutra consumers too!

Dr. Tania Sharma, Ph.D., CRC

CEO – Life Sutra

Mission: To provide practical psychoeducation to individuals, couples and families to live better, engaged, meaningful, fun and connected lives.

Vision: To develop games and tools to enhance individual, couple and family relationships and Life skills.

Values: Access to practical psychoeducation for all; fostering receptive and connected relationships

Life Sutra Games

Best Gift for any Occasion

BEST CHRISTMAS GIFT FOR NEWLYWEDS – a fun way of entering married life, creating romantic and joyous memories through deep conversations and thoughtful activities
GET DEEP AND AFFECTIONATE – helps you discover new things about your partner through conversations on different topics across different life areas.
BACKED BY SCIENCE – Designed based on scientific and psychological techniques used in marriage counseling, with CBT, EMDR, and mindfulness
PREMIUM ANNIVERSARY GIFT – best quality, and elegant looking gift for your partner, with the use of FSC certified paper for sustainability in packaging. Our cards are printed with love and promote environment friendly products
BUSINESS WITH A HEART – Combine GREAT FUN along with heartwarming activities. Part of our profits from each game purchased is donated to Feeding America
FOR ANY OCCASION – couples toys – husband gift – marriage card game – married games – connect card – couple love – conversation cards couples – couple conversation starters – spouse games – couple question game – anniversary gift husband – best couples game – conversation cards – couples question cards – communication game – couples things – partner games – newlywed games – couple card games – couple activities – newlywed game – romantic couple


Read more





Talk, Connect & Share

Couple Connect game will help you generate thought provoking conversations that will strengthen and deepen your relationship.

Do, Act & Experiment

This card will also help you try behavioral techniques that will increase mindfulness, awareness and acceptance in your relationship

Game that Creates Special Moments

Deepen your bond holistically across 13 important life areas. It's a great tool for learning about each other, staying on the same page, and sharing ideas and feelings.

Read more


Couple Connect is a card game for couples with easy-to-follow instructions. The strategic game helps to deepen your connection, talk about things that are difficult to talk about, and reconnect in the best way possible.

Build trust, intimacy and reignite your romance. Couple Connect is a great tool for improving communication in your relationship.


A New Way to Connect

Write a new story about how you two communicate today

Build a deeper, emotional bond with your partner by asking meaningful questions & doing fun activities great for your relationship.


Spice it up - Rekindle the Romantic Spark

Try a variety of novel psychological techniques and feel your romantic moments more intensely.

Learn to re-program your mind and body to classify positive romantic moments as "sparks."


Feel Loved & Cherished

Couple Connect will help you discover how you both feel loved, cared for, and nurtured by each other.

When you play our game, you create a dedicated space in your day to deepen your bond, pay positive attention, and make each other feel special.


Enjoy Deeper Access to Your Partner

Every card you play gives you a doorway into your partner's thoughts and feelings.

Couple Connect can help you communicate with your partner in novel ways that you may not have tried before.


WHY


EVERYONE


LOVES


THIS GAME


Couple Connect Couple Reconnect Dating Connect Social Genius Bulls & Bears Board Game
Discover Life Sutra Games For couples who have been together less than 10 years and want to strengthen their bond For Couples who have been together for 10+ years and want to rekindle Romantic Spark Game for singles who want to master the Art of Dating Family Game to master Social Skills and boost confidence Family Game to Master Personal Finance & Investments
Players 2 2 1 - 2 2 - 6 2 - 6
Play Time 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 15 - 90 min 30 - 90 min 30 - 90 min
Designed by Psychologist ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Premium Gift ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Game Type Card Game Card Game Card Game Card Game Board Game

Price: $21.99 - $15.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:53 UTC – Details)


It’s grid-spinning, game-changing fun in this strategy board game of weights and balances! Players choose where to put their disc into the grid, and then spin the column to line them up. They need to get 4 in a row–horizontally, vertically, or diagonally –to win. But they also need to keep an eye out for their opponent’s disc placement before spinning or they might throw them a victory. Each set of discs includes a weighted disc that can change the game in an instant. With 2 game modes, Beginner and Expert, the Connect 4 Spin game is a great choice for a family game night and play dates for kids ages 8 and up. This 2-player game is a fun family and kids gift. Hasbro Gaming and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.
FAMILY BOARD GAME FOR KIDS AGES 8 AND UP: Get ready for suspense, strategy, and surprises! The Connect 4 Spin game is the first Connect 4 board game that features a spinning grid
FUN STRATEGY GAME: Pop in a disc and then spin the column. Who knows how the discs will line up? Things can change in an instant while playing this strategic game of weights and balances
4 THE WIN: Strategy is the key but be prepared for surprising wins and swings in gameplay! The first player to connect 4 discs horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins the game
FEATURES 2 GAME MODES: Players can choose their challenge and play using rules for Beginner Mode or Expert Mode. One of the most exciting 2-player board games, makes a great choice for family gifts.
WEIGHTED DISC: Each color set of discs contains one disc with extra weight. Players can use it at anytime for a strategic advantage
FUN GIFTS FOR KIDS: Strategy Board Games are excellent adult and kids gifts for families that love playing indoor games.


Read more


Spinning Grid!

Get ready for a different Connect 4 gaming experience! Use strategy like never before with this Connect 4 game featuring a spinning grid.

Read more





Get 4 in a Row to Win!

Place a disc anywhere in the grid and then spin that column. But spin strategically because lining up 4 in a row doesn’t count unless the discs still line up after spinning.

Weighted Discs!

Each color set includes a disc with extra weight that players can use to their advantage.

Easy Storage!

Players can conveniently store the game discs right on the game unit, making clean up a breeze.

Unpredictable Gameplay!

Suspense builds throughout this game of weights and balances. Players experience surprising victories and “I nearly had it” losses as they try to figure out which side of the grid will end up on top.

Read more


4.5
Price: $21.99 - $15.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:53 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:50 UTC – Details)


With the VTech IS8251-5 5-Handset Cordless Phone featuring the industry’s largest 5″ color base display, managing your communication has never been easier. Assign shortcuts on the large disply for quick access to features that are important to you and easily view all the releveant information from messages left on the answering system. With and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
[Business-grade Cordless Phone built for ease of use at home] VTech IS8251 cordless brings excellent clarity and range, ensuring highest quality in voice communications for business or private calls. Featuring 5″ color base display, large icons, soft keys for seamless call management. Programmable short-cuts for quick access to phone functions that are important to you.
[Enhance efficiency] One-touch access to important contacts; One-touch to call back the caller from listed message or call history; Timer function to help you split your time doing tasks more efficiently.
[Never missed a call] An Virtual 2-line system manages calls from landline and cell-line simonteniously. Pair up to 2 cell phones or one cell phone and one Bluetooth headset for use with landline calls.
[Advanced Digital Answering System] The 5″ color base LCD displays the caller information of the message received, allows you to choose who to listen first from the message list displayed. Extra long 40 mins recording time ensuring all incoming messages captured.
[Smart Call Blocker] Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time.
[Caller ID Announce] The handset and base announce the name of the caller, so you don’t have to scramble for the handset to see who’s calling. With the 5″ base display the caller details are visible more clearly even from farther away


Read more




  • Screen – the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve – avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List – add friend/family’s name, and the exact name of the trusted organization, into the list to ensure their calls will ring through.
  • Block – you can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot with the Call Block button in the base or handset. Add the intruder’s number to the Block List so they will be blocked permanently.

Price: $69.95 - $45.32
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:58 UTC – Details)


With the VTech IS8121-2 2-Handset Expandable Cordless Phone featuring, Super Long Range, Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. With up to 2300 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on this cordless phone system lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** SUPER LONE RANGE UP TO 2300 FEET ** Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet or range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.
** SMART CALL BLOCKER ** Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through – even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch on the delicated key on the handset. The call block directory can store up to 1,000 name and number entries.
** BLUETOOTH CONNECT TO CELL ** Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones, or one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer.
** DIGITAL ANSWERING SYSTEM WITH VOICE GUIDE ** This cordless system includes a digital answering machine that has a LED message counter, and records up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements and memos. A built-in voice guide can help you to set up the system easily.
** LARGE 2-INCH SCREEN, BIG TEXT, LIGHTED KEY PAD ** High-contrast text on the extra-large 2 inch screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the enlarged font and extra-large and lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions. This feature is especially helpful for those who are visually impaired.
** SPEAKERPHONE and VISUAL RINGER ** This cordless system has built-in a full-duplex speakerphone on handset allowing both ends to speak – and be heard – at the same time for conversations that are more true to life. Also designed with a lighted up visual ringer on top of the handset for noisier environments, or for those with weakened hearing.

Read more

Greater Mobility

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology. With over 2000 feet of range, you can be on a call anywhere in your home, yard, or even your neighbors home.

Smart Call Blocker

Enjoy more peace of mind at home with the Smart Call Blocker, a screening tool built-in the IS8121. With one time set up, the system will carry out your commands automatically.

  • Screen - the system prevents robocalls from interrupting your day by filtering all home calls (from landline) before your phone rings.
  • Approve - avoid unwanted calls by requiring callers (from landline) to identify themselves, allowing you to decide if you want to answer.
  • Star Name List - save callers like friends and family, your trusted organization to the phonebook, so they are always allowed through.

You can also block nuisance callers (from landline or cell-line) on the spot by pressing the Call Block key. Add the intruder's number to the block list so they will be blocked permanently.

Connect to Cell

By connecting your mobile phone with Bluetooth technology, this system allows you to make and receive calls from your cellular plan and landline while enjoying the comforts of a home phone system. It is particularly helpful for those who experiencing signal dead spots at home. By placing the paired cell phone at where it has stronger reception, then use the cordless handsets to make and receive calls. Even if your cell phone is in a different room, you can still place a call, write or read a text, access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Note: Bluetooth wireless technology operates within a short range (approximately 15 feet) from the telephone base. Please keep connected cell phones and headsets within this range for optimum performance.

Virtual 2-Line Phone

This system's Bluetooth Connect to Cell integrates your cell phone for your calls at home, with or without a landline. Compatible with Bluetooth version 2.0 or above devices, you can pair up two cell devices (cell phone or Bluetooth headset), and connect one cell device to be used with landline calls at the same time. Perfect for busy family where one handset can support a landline call while the other handset on a cell-line call. If you are using Android phones (OS 2.3 or higher), you can further extend the flexibility of your telephone system with use of the free Connect To Cell application. VTech Connect to Cell comprises Caller ID manager and Alerts manager that help integrate your cell with your telephone system. Note: for optimal performance of the cordless system, keep the cell device charged and located within 15 feet of the telephone base. Your cell phone’s battery discharges faster while it is connected to the telephone base via Bluetooth wireless technology.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of incoming messages, outgoing announcements, and memos. They system allows for instant playback, selective save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base.

  • 1000 Call Block Directory
  • 1000 Phonebook Directory
  • 50 Caller ID History

2" backlit display and high contrast text makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low light conditions.

Enjoy more true to life conversations with the high quality full-duplex speakerphone built-in on each handset.

Read more

  • Visual Ringer
  • Redial Button
  • Mute Button
  • Quiet Mode

Expandable to 5 handsets using IS8102 accessory handset (sold separately).

Read more

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:11:58 UTC - Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:50 UTC – Details)


With the AT&T DL72319 DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone featuring Bluetooth Connect to Cell and Smart Call Blocker, you won’t have to worry about unwanted calls waking you up in the middle of the night or tying up the line. Robocalls are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. You can also permanently blacklist any number you want with one touch. Bluetooth Connect to Cell technology on the AT&T DL72319 DECT 6.0 Expandable Cordless Phone lets you receive cell and/or landline calls from one home phone system. With a touch of a button, enjoy the high-tech benefits your smart phone offers. Even if your smart phone is in a different room, you can still access Siri or Google Now from the cordless handsets. Place a call, write or read a text and perform all the other actions these services offer. Easily add accessory handsets—up to 5 total—with just one phone jack.；The product voltage arrange is 110V
Long Range – Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology.
Connect to Cell – Make and receive calls from your cellular plan while enjoying the comforts of a home phone. Pair up to 2 cell phones and connect 2 cell phones. Or one cell phone and one Bluetooth headset for use with landline calls.
Smart Call Blocker – Say goodbye to unwanted calls. Robocalls on your landline are automatically blocked from ever ringing through—even the first time. Up to 1,000 name and number call-block directory.
Digital Answering System with voice guide – With up to 22 minutes of recording time. Talking prompts walk you through the setup of your new phone’s digital answering system. Lighted display indicates how many new messages you have waiting.
1.8″ white backlit dislpay and big buttons – High-contrast makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the big handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions.
Simulated full-duplex handset speakerphone – Enjoy a speakerphone that can keep up with your calls. Increase participation by allowing both ends to speak—and be heard—at the same time for conversations that are more true to life.
Virtual multi-line operation – Connect a cellular line and landline to your cordless system. Then, enjoy the freedom to make and receive calls on two lines—all at once.
Expandable up to 5 handsets uses DL70019 accessory handset (sold separately)

Read more

1. Pair and connect up to 2 cell phones, or, one cell phone and one BLUETOOTH headset for use with landline calls.

2. Siri, S Voice and Google Now access.

3. Downloadable phone-book directory from your mobile to home phone.

Quick Setup to let the system working for you.

Set Directory for your family so their calls will go through without the screening. 1. Press MENU on handset. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Directory, then Select. 3. Press Select again to choose Add new entry, then Select. 4. Enter the telephone number, then Select.

Set Allow list so their calls do not get through the screening. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow kay to Allow list, then Select. 3. Press Up/Down arrow key to Add new entry, then Select. 4. Enter telephone number, then Select. 5. Enter name, then Select.

Set Block List to prevent their calls from ringing through. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Block list, Select. 3. Press Up/Down to Add new entry, Select. 4. Enter the telephone number, then press Select.

Set Star name list for your trusted organizations. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Star name list, Select. 3. Press Up/Down to Add new entry, Select. 4. Enter the name (up to 15 characters), then press Select.

Now you are ready to start using your telephone system with Smart call blocker! Pick one of the options below to suit your preferences:

Screen and block robocalls. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3 Press Up/Down arrow key to Screen robot, then Select.

Screen all unknown calls. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3. Press Up/Down key to Screen Unknown, then Select.

Block calls on the block list only. (This is also the Default settings of the system.) 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3. Press Up/Down arrow key to Allow unknown, then Select.

For complete operation instructions, the user’s manual can be found from the Product Support section of our company website.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of messages. The system allows for instant playback, save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base, and remote access to listen to messages and change outgoing announcement.

With the full-duplex speakerphone on handset and base unit, this phone set not only lets you speak hands-free but also allows both ends to speak and be heard at the same time. Enjoy conversations that are more true to life.

High-contrast text on the extra-large 1.8″ screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the white back lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions.

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology.

Read more

Read more

4

Set Star name list for your trusted organizations. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Star name list, Select. 3. Press Up/Down to Add new entry, Select. 4. Enter the name (up to 15 characters), then press Select.

Now you are ready to start using your telephone system with Smart call blocker! Pick one of the options below to suit your preferences:

Screen and block robocalls. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3 Press Up/Down arrow key to Screen robot, then Select.

Screen all unknown calls. 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3. Press Up/Down key to Screen Unknown, then Select.

Block calls on the block list only. (This is also the Default settings of the system.) 1. Press CALL BLOCK. 2. Press Up/Down arrow key to Set profile, then Select. 3. Press Up/Down arrow key to Allow unknown, then Select.

For complete operation instructions, the user’s manual can be found from the Product Support section of our company website.

Digitally record up to 22 minutes of messages. The system allows for instant playback, save or delete, and skipping or repeating messages from the handset and base, and remote access to listen to messages and change outgoing announcement.

With the full-duplex speakerphone on handset and base unit, this phone set not only lets you speak hands-free but also allows both ends to speak and be heard at the same time. Enjoy conversations that are more true to life.

High-contrast text on the extra-large 1.8″ screen makes it easy to read incoming caller ID or call history records. Plus, the white back lighted handset keypad allows for easy dialing in low-light conditions.

Experience the best in long-range coverage and clarity, provided by a unique antenna design and advances in noise-filtering technology.

Read more

Challenge a friend to disc dropping fun with the classic game of Connect 4! Drop your red or yellow discs in the grid and be the first to get 4 in a row to win. If your opponent is getting too close to 4 in a row, block them with your own disc! Whoever wins can pull out the slider bar to release all the discs and start the fun all over again! Connect 4 and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
Classic Connect 4 game is disc dropping fun
Choose yellow or red discs. For 2 players
When you get 4 discs in a row you win
Includes grid, 2 legs, slider bar, 21 red discs, 21 yellow discs and instructions

Read more

The Connect 4 game is a classic strategy game in which 2 players go head-to-head in a battle to own the grid!

Players choose yellow or red discs. They drop the discs into the grid, starting in the middle or at the edge to stack their colored discs upwards, horizontally, or diagonally. Use strategy to block opponents while aiming to be the first player to get 4 in a row to win. The Connect 4 game is a great choice for a play date, a rainy day activity, or anytime your kids want a fun game to play with a friend. It’s fun to go 4 the win! For ages 6 and up.

Read more

GET 4 IN A ROW

4 the win! Have fun watching the colored discs slide into place, as players try to get 4 of the same color in a row to win.

CLASSIC CONNECT 4 GAMEPLAY

Remember playing the Connect 4 game as a kid? Introduce your kids to the classic Connect 4 game and enjoy playing this entertaining strategy game together.

EXCITING STRATEGY GAME

Challenge a friend to rule the grid! Strategy drives the competition in this classic Connect 4 game. Line ’em up, block opponents, and get 4 of the same color discs in a row to win.
